page.title: 11 THE B.A.T.S.
page.content: Pam Jones is the main script-writer for the BATS (Betley Amateur Theatrical Society).She has been in the BATS for 14 years.There are approx.30 members and they do 2 or 3 shows a year which are performed mostly in Betley village hall but they sometimes perform in Balterly and Whitmore.The largest audience was for Â£Scrooge' which was performed at Betley Village Hall and written by Pam herself.Some of the other plays that the BATS perform are produced by Judy Hudson, Bill Andrews and Phillip Bailey.The lighting is controlled by Adrian Bailey and Ron Jones in charge of the props.There is also Sara Martin who does the make-up and Sue Bailey who does the hair.Also Jean Maybe who makes the costumes. There was no other society before the BATS.
